import React from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const {loading, error, product} = productDetails; const { id } = useParams(); return(
Vrati se nazad

  • {product.name}

  • Cijena: {product.price} KM

  • Opis: {product.description}

  • Cijena
    {product.price} KM
  • Dostupnost
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( Na stanju ) : ( Nema na stanju ) }
) } export default ProductScreen;
